scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 1 EXT. DAY. CAR SHOWROOM

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: 27-year-old, wearing a white shirt and white pants, glasses, carrying a laptop bag. Appears observant, looking at an expensive car.

actors.name: JYOTHI
actors.description: Voice on a phone call, sounds hurried.

location.name: Car Showroom
location.specific_details: Located in Kozhikode. An expensive car is seen through the glass facade. Water is pooled on the road outside. Reflections of the road and vehicles are visible in the glass when slight sunlight hits.

crowd.crowd_type: Background traffic and pedestrians implied by 'roadum vaahanangalum'.

time.weather: Cloudy (irunda anthareeksham), slight sunlight (cheriya veyil) occasionally, implies recent or ongoing rain.

scenes.technical_notes: Use of glass reflections, fade in road sounds, focus on Unni's solitary observation before the call.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 2 EXT. DAY. MLA’S HOUSE

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Arrives at the MLA's house on a bike, sends a message on WhatsApp.

actors.name: JYOTHI
actors.description: Appears in lawyer attire, around 25 years old, in a hurry, gives instructions to Unni.

actors.name: MAN 1
actors.description: A politician, talking with Man 2 outside the house.

actors.name: MAN 2
actors.description: A politician, talking with Man 1, looks at the sky commenting on rain probability.

location.name: MLA’s House
location.specific_details: A large house with a bike stand. A board indicates 'Reshma George, MLA'. Two politicians are conversing near the gate.

crowd.crowd_type: Two politicians conversing in the background.

time.weather: Implied chance of rain ('Nalla mazhaykk saadhyatha und').

scenes.technical_notes: Focus on Unni's WhatsApp interaction, then Jyothi's quick exchange with Unni.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 2A INT. DAY. MLA’S HOUSE/LIVING ROOM/OFFICE

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Observes the scene, attempts to initiate a conversation with George, stands in the background.

actors.name: RESHMA GEORGE (MLA)
actors.description: Sitting, receives legal documents, signs them, asks about the lawyers.

actors.name: GEORGE
actors.description: MLA's husband, sitting, dismissive and rude to Unni.

actors.name: CHAAKKAPPAN
actors.description: An aged politician, reads news from papers, suggests political influence.

actors.name: JYOTHI
actors.description: Presents legal documents to MLA, points out signing spots, identifies herself as Gangaadharan vakkeel's junior.

location.name: MLA’s House/Living Room/Office
location.specific_details: A room inside the MLA's house where MLA Reshma George, her husband George, and an aged politician (Chaakkappan) are seated. Papers with news headlines are being read.

scenes.technical_notes: Close-ups on paper headlines, Unni's reaction shots to George's rudeness.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 2B EXT. DAY. MLA’S HOUSE/GATE

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Takes his bike, then deliberately turns it off after seeing the MLA's car leave. Appears thoughtful.

actors.name: JYOTHI
actors.description: Gets on her scooty, gives Unni instructions about Moosa's affidavit, and drives off.

actors.name: MLA (Reshma George)
actors.description: Her car is seen leaving through the gate.

location.name: MLA’s House/Gate
location.specific_details: The area just outside the MLA's house gate where vehicles are parked.

scenes.technical_notes: Unni's deliberate action of turning off the bike after seeing the MLA's car.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 2C INT. DAY. MLA’S HOUSE/OFFICE

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Enters the room, confidently pitches his strategy to George, emphasizing his personal stake in the case.

actors.name: GEORGE
actors.description: Sitting, then stands, dismisses Unni's proposal with a smile, indicating that the vakkaalath is already given.

actors.name: CHAAKKAPPAN
actors.description: Present in the room, getting ready to leave with George.

location.name: MLA’s House/Office
location.specific_details: The MLA's office room, where George and Chaakkappan are preparing to leave.

scenes.technical_notes: Unni's confident and slightly challenging demeanor, George's dismissive smile, Unni's reaction cut.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 2D EXT. DAY. MLA’S HOUSE/VERANDAH/CAR PARKING

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Walks alongside George, detailing his plan to prove a fake order, introduces himself as Mukundan Unni, gets a negative reaction from George and Chaakkappan.

actors.name: GEORGE
actors.description: Walks to the car, listens to Unni's detailed plan, questions his experience, firmly rejects his offer.

actors.name: CHAAKKAPPAN
actors.description: Laughs mockingly at Unni's inexperience.

location.name: MLA’s House/Verandah/Car Parking
location.specific_details: The verandah area leading to the car parking outside the MLA's house.

scenes.technical_notes: Unni's detailed explanation of the legal strategy, George's final dismissal, Unni's reaction shot.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 3 EXT. DAY. EMERALD TOWERS

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Parks his bike in the parking area.

location.name: Emerald Towers
location.specific_details: The parking area of a new eight-story building called 'Emerald Towers', situated on Mavoor Road.

scenes.technical_notes: Establishing shot of the building and Unni's bike.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 3A INT. DAY. GANGA ASSOCIATES

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Enters the office.

actors.name: JYOTHI
actors.description: Rushes to Unni, informs him that Gangadharan sir is looking for him.

location.name: Ganga Associates Office
location.specific_details: An office located on the 3rd floor, named 'Ganga Associates'.

scenes.technical_notes: Jyothi's hurried movement.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 3B INT. DAY. GANGA ASSOCIATES

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Enters Gangadharan's room, shows documents, denies giving advice, then confronts Gangadharan, is fired, and defiantly responds.

actors.name: GANGADHARAN (Vakkeel)
actors.description: A senior lawyer, questions Unni about the affidavit, hears out his junior, then confronts and fires Unni for interfering with the MLA's case, reacting strongly to Unni's disrespect.

actors.name: JUNIOR (Jomy)
actors.description: Discusses a case with Gangadharan, receives instructions.

actors.name: MATHEWS (Clerk)
actors.description: Present in the room, makes a gesture for Unni to leave.

location.name: Ganga Associates Office
location.specific_details: Gangadharan vakkeel's private room within the 'Ganga Associates' office.

scenes.technical_notes: Gangadharan's shift in demeanor, Unni's defiant act of shaking dust from his bag on the desk, sound of faint thunder ('mangiya idi vettunna shabdham').

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 4 EXT/INT. DAY. NAME BOARD SHOP

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Enters a shop, partially wet from the rain, writes his name and designation on paper.

location.name: Name Board Shop
location.specific_details: A shop that prepares name boards, located below Paragon Hotel. Unni enters from heavy rain.

scenes.technical_notes: Visuals of heavy rain, Unni wet from rain, sound of rain.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 4A INT. DAY. NAME BOARD SHOP

location.name: Name Board Shop
location.specific_details: Inside the name board shop, an engraving machine is operating.

scenes.technical_notes: Engraving machine turning ON, focus on the name 'ADVOCATE MUKUNDAN UNNI - M.COM LLB' being engraved. Music cue.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 4B EXT. DAY. WAYANAD HAIRPIN

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Riding his bike, wet from the rain, climbing the Wayanad churam (hairpin bends).

location.name: Wayanad Hairpin
location.specific_details: The winding roads of Wayanad churam.

scenes.technical_notes: Slow fade to black, slow scrolling title for cast list.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 5 INT. DAY. COURT CANTEEN

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Seriously examining a case file, attempts to secure a new client, but is rejected.

actors.name: LADY CLIENT
actors.description: A Muslim woman, appears around 50 years old, expresses hesitation and explains she found another lawyer due to Unni's lack of experience.

actors.name: ROBIN
actors.description: Enters and sits with Unni, asks about the outcome of the client meeting.

actors.name: JYOTHI
actors.description: Sends a voice note to Unni, asking him to come to the tea stall.

location.name: Court Canteen
location.specific_details: The canteen of the Wayanad district court.

crowd.crowd_type: Court canteen crowd, generating ambient noise.

scenes.technical_notes: Black screen with 'ONE MONTH LATER' text, slow fade in of ambient sounds and visuals. Mobile notification sound for voice note.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 5A EXT. DAY. COURT TEA STALL

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Walks with Robin, sits with Jyothi, observes Robin's situation, and engages in a cynical discussion about legal practice with Jyothi.

actors.name: ROBIN
actors.description: Suggests Unni join him, orders coffee, comments on Jyothi's cases, displays a shabby appearance (worn shirt, dirty shoes), goes to meet his client.

actors.name: JYOTHI
actors.description: Drinks coffee, orders more, cynically comments on her cases, expresses 'manushyatham' (humanity), and argues with Unni about the ethics of law.

actors.name: TEA STALL PAYYAN (Boy)
actors.description: Serves coffee to the three characters.

actors.name: DRIVER (Robin's client)
actors.description: An ordinary driver in a khaki shirt and checked mundu, seen approaching to meet Robin.

location.name: Court Tea Stall
location.specific_details: A tea stall located outside the court.

scenes.technical_notes: Jyothi's expressive reactions to cold coffee and later to Unni's cynicism. Robin's dishevelled appearance contrasted with his assertion of authority. Unni's focused observation.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 6/6A INT/EXT. DAY. UNNI’S HOME/NEWS STUDIO

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Follows a disciplined morning routine: wakes at 5 AM, exercises, washes/irons clothes, tidies his room, watches news, eats breakfast, reacts calmly to a snake, and secures the outhouse.

actors.name: UNNI’S AMMA
actors.description: Works in the kitchen, falls from a stool, screams in fear upon seeing a snake.

actors.name: NEWS ANCHOR
actors.description: On TV, moderates a discussion about medical negligence, arguing against scapegoating doctors.

actors.name: PARTICIPANT
actors.description: On TV, contributes to the news discussion.

location.name: Unni’s Home/News Studio (on TV)
location.specific_details: Unni's modest home, characterized by orderliness and old appliances. Features a kitchen, dining area with a TV, a bedroom, and an outside verandah/outhouse. News studio visible on TV.

scenes.technical_notes: Music cue for montage, visuals emphasizing Unni's discipline. TV screen integration. Sound design for mother's scream and snake movement. Unni's calm reaction to the snake.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 7 INT. DAY. MERCURY HOSPITAL/BILLING SECTION

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Sits in the waiting area, then approaches the cashier, expresses surprise and concern about the high advance payment for his mother's operation.

actors.name: ROBIN
actors.description: Enters, asks Unni what happened.

actors.name: CASHIER
actors.description: Informs Unni about the required 50,000 INR advance payment for the operation.

actors.name: MEENAKSHI (Staff)
actors.description: Sits nearby, smiles, implying a detached or knowing attitude.

actors.name: Patient (Token 39)
actors.description: An individual who stands up and goes to billing when their token is called.

location.name: Mercury Trauma Care Hospital/Billing Section
location.specific_details: The billing counter and adjacent waiting area of the Mercury Trauma Care Hospital.

scenes.technical_notes: Mechanical voice calling token numbers. Unni's reaction to the payment amount. Meenakshi's subtle smile.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 8 EXT. DAY. ATM

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Stands in the ATM queue, listening to Robin.

actors.name: ROBIN
actors.description: Stands in the ATM queue, explains why he's not in court (took an acting gig for 500 INR), winks at Unni.

actors.name: MANOJ ETTAN
actors.description: Mentioned as a 'thadiyan' (fat man) who rides a bullet, his son needs an actor for a play.

location.name: ATM
location.specific_details: An outdoor ATM with a queue.

crowd.crowd_type: People waiting in an ATM queue.

scenes.technical_notes: Robin winking. Focus on their conversation while waiting.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 8A INT. DAY. ATM

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Withdraws all his available balance (7500 INR) from the ATM.

location.name: ATM
location.specific_details: Inside the ATM booth.

scenes.technical_notes: Close-up on the ATM screen showing the balance and withdrawal.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 9 INT. DAY. MERCURY HOSPITAL/BILLING SECTION

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Presents 7500 INR to the hospital staff, suggesting it for the payment.

actors.name: MEENAKSHI
actors.description: Hospital staff, looks at the money and informs Unni that 50,000 INR is required for the operation.

actors.name: CASHIER CHECHI
actors.description: Next to Meenakshi, likely assisting with billing.

actors.name: ROBIN
actors.description: Sits in the waiting area, observing.

actors.name: MANI
actors.description: A patient standing at the cashier's counter, providing slips.

location.name: Mercury Trauma Care Hospital/Billing Section
location.specific_details: The billing counter of Mercury Trauma Care Hospital.

crowd.crowd_type: Patients and staff at the billing counter.

scenes.technical_notes: Close-up on the small amount of money, Meenakshi's dismissive reaction.

actors.name: CASHIER Johnson

actors.name: Mani
actors.description: An agent handling cash transactions for various individuals.

actors.name: Unni
actors.description: Observing Mani and Meenakshi, asking questions.

actors.description: Hands a patient file to Meenakshi.

actors.name: Mani
actors.description: Continuing to pay large sums of cash.

actors.name: Unni
actors.description: Observing Mani with growing curiosity.

actors.name: Meenakshi
actors.description: Hospital employee, handling receipts.

actors.name: CASHIER Chacko
actors.description: 40 years old, cashier.

actors.name: Cashier Chechi
actors.description: Observing Meenakshi and Mani's interaction.

location.name: Mercury Hospital

scenes.scene_heading: INT. DAY. MERCURY HOSPITAL/BILLING SECTION - KAKSHIKAL EXPLANATION

actors.name: Meenakshi

actors.name: Unni
actors.description: Confused then enlightened by Meenakshi's explanation.

actors.name: Mani
actors.description: Exiting the billing section after collecting receipts.

actors.description: Presents legal documents to MLA, points out signing spots, identifies herself as Gangaadharan vakkeel's junior.

location.specific_details: A room inside the MLA's house where MLA Reshma George, her husband George, and an aged politician (Chaakkappan) are seated. Papers with news headlines are being read.

scenes.technical_notes: Close-ups on paper headlines, Unni's reaction shots to George's rudeness.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 2B EXT. DAY. MLA’S HOUSE/GATE

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Takes his bike, then deliberately turns it off after seeing the MLA's car leave. Appears thoughtful.

actors.name: JYOTHI
actors.description: Gets on her scooty, gives Unni instructions about Moosa's affidavit, and drives off.

actors.name: MLA (Reshma George)
actors.description: Her car is seen leaving through the gate.

location.name: MLA’s House/Gate
location.specific_details: The area just outside the MLA's house gate where vehicles are parked.

scenes.technical_notes: Unni's deliberate action of turning off the bike after seeing the MLA's car.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 2C INT. DAY. MLA’S HOUSE/OFFICE

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Enters the room, confidently pitches his strategy to George, emphasizing his personal stake in the case.

actors.name: GEORGE
actors.description: Sitting, then stands, dismisses Unni's proposal with a smile, indicating that the vakkaalath is already given.

actors.name: CHAAKKAPPAN
actors.description: Present in the room, getting ready to leave with George.

location.name: MLA’s House/Office
location.specific_details: The MLA's office room, where George and Chaakkappan are preparing to leave.

scenes.technical_notes: Unni's confident and slightly challenging demeanor, George's dismissive smile, Unni's reaction cut.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 2D EXT. DAY. MLA’S HOUSE/VERANDAH/CAR PARKING

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Walks alongside George, detailing his plan to prove a fake order, introduces himself as Mukundan Unni, gets a negative reaction from George and Chaakkappan.

actors.name: GEORGE
actors.description: Walks to the car, listens to Unni's detailed plan, questions his experience, firmly rejects his offer.

actors.name: CHAAKKAPPAN
actors.description: Laughs mockingly at Unni's inexperience.

location.name: MLA’s House/Verandah/Car Parking
location.specific_details: The verandah area leading to the car parking outside the MLA's house.

scenes.technical_notes: Unni's detailed explanation of the legal strategy, George's final dismissal, Unni's reaction shot.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 3 EXT. DAY. EMERALD TOWERS

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Parks his bike in the parking area.

location.name: Emerald Towers
location.specific_details: The parking area of a new eight-story building called 'Emerald Towers', situated on Mavoor Road.

scenes.technical_notes: Establishing shot of the building and Unni's bike.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 3A INT. DAY. GANGA ASSOCIATES

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Enters the office.

actors.name: JYOTHI
actors.description: Rushes to Unni, informs him that Gangadharan sir is looking for him.

location.name: Ganga Associates Office
location.specific_details: An office located on the 3rd floor, named 'Ganga Associates'.

scenes.technical_notes: Jyothi's hurried movement.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 3B INT. DAY. GANGA ASSOCIATES

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Enters Gangadharan's room, shows documents, denies giving advice, then confronts Gangadharan, is fired, and defiantly responds.

actors.name: GANGADHARAN (Vakkeel)
actors.description: A senior lawyer, questions Unni about the affidavit, hears out his junior, then confronts and fires Unni for interfering with the MLA's case, reacting strongly to Unni's disrespect.

actors.name: JUNIOR (Jomy)
actors.description: Discusses a case with Gangadharan, receives instructions.

actors.name: MATHEWS (Clerk)
actors.description: Present in the room, makes a gesture for Unni to leave.

location.name: Ganga Associates Office
location.specific_details: Gangadharan vakkeel's private room within the 'Ganga Associates' office.

scenes.technical_notes: Gangadharan's shift in demeanor, Unni's defiant act of shaking dust from his bag on the desk, sound of faint thunder ('mangiya idi vettunna shabdham').

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 4 EXT/INT. DAY. NAME BOARD SHOP

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Enters a shop, partially wet from the rain, writes his name and designation on paper.

location.name: Name Board Shop
location.specific_details: A shop that prepares name boards, located below Paragon Hotel. Unni enters from heavy rain.

scenes.technical_notes: Visuals of heavy rain, Unni wet from rain, sound of rain.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 4A INT. DAY. NAME BOARD SHOP

location.name: Name Board Shop
location.specific_details: Inside the name board shop, an engraving machine is operating.

scenes.technical_notes: Engraving machine turning ON, focus on the name 'ADVOCATE MUKUNDAN UNNI - M.COM LLB' being engraved. Music cue.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 4B EXT. DAY. WAYANAD HAIRPIN

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Riding his bike, wet from the rain, climbing the Wayanad churam (hairpin bends).

location.name: Wayanad Hairpin
location.specific_details: The winding roads of Wayanad churam.

scenes.technical_notes: Slow fade to black, slow scrolling title for cast list.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 5 INT. DAY. COURT CANTEEN

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Seriously examining a case file, attempts to secure a new client, but is rejected.

actors.name: LADY CLIENT
actors.description: A Muslim woman, appears around 50 years old, expresses hesitation and explains she found another lawyer due to Unni's lack of experience.

actors.name: ROBIN
actors.description: Enters and sits with Unni, asks about the outcome of the client meeting.

actors.name: JYOTHI
actors.description: Sends a voice note to Unni, asking him to come to the tea stall.

location.name: Court Canteen
location.specific_details: The canteen of the Wayanad district court.

crowd.crowd_type: Court canteen crowd, generating ambient noise.

scenes.technical_notes: Black screen with 'ONE MONTH LATER' text, slow fade in of ambient sounds and visuals. Mobile notification sound for voice note.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 5A EXT. DAY. COURT TEA STALL

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Walks with Robin, sits with Jyothi, observes Robin's situation, and engages in a cynical discussion about legal practice with Jyothi.

actors.name: ROBIN
actors.description: Suggests Unni join him, orders coffee, comments on Jyothi's cases, displays a shabby appearance (worn shirt, dirty shoes), goes to meet his client.

actors.name: JYOTHI
actors.description: Drinks coffee, orders more, cynically comments on her cases, expresses 'manushyatham' (humanity), and argues with Unni about the ethics of law.

actors.name: TEA STALL PAYYAN (Boy)
actors.description: Serves coffee to the three characters.

actors.name: DRIVER (Robin's client)
actors.description: An ordinary driver in a khaki shirt and checked mundu, seen approaching to meet Robin.

location.name: Court Tea Stall
location.specific_details: A tea stall located outside the court.

scenes.technical_notes: Jyothi's expressive reactions to cold coffee and later to Unni's cynicism. Robin's dishevelled appearance contrasted with his assertion of authority. Unni's focused observation.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 6/6A INT/EXT. DAY. UNNI’S HOME/NEWS STUDIO

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Follows a disciplined morning routine: wakes at 5 AM, exercises, washes/irons clothes, tidies his room, watches news, eats breakfast, reacts calmly to a snake, and secures the outhouse.

actors.name: UNNI’S AMMA
actors.description: Works in the kitchen, falls from a stool, screams in fear upon seeing a snake.

actors.name: NEWS ANCHOR
actors.description: On TV, moderates a discussion about medical negligence, arguing against scapegoating doctors.

actors.name: PARTICIPANT
actors.description: On TV, contributes to the news discussion.

location.name: Unni’s Home/News Studio (on TV)
location.specific_details: Unni's modest home, characterized by orderliness and old appliances. Features a kitchen, dining area with a TV, a bedroom, and an outside verandah/outhouse. News studio visible on TV.

scenes.technical_notes: Music cue for montage, visuals emphasizing Unni's discipline. TV screen integration. Sound design for mother's scream and snake movement. Unni's calm reaction to the snake.

scenes.scene_heading: SCENE 7 INT. DAY. MERCURY HOSPITAL/BILLING SECTION

actors.name: Mukundan Unni
actors.description: Sits in the waiting area, then approaches the cashier, expresses surprise and concern about the high advance payment for his mother's operation.

actors.name: ROBIN
actors.description: Enters, asks Unni what happened.

actors.name: CASHIER
actors.description: Informs Unni about the required 50,000 INR advance payment for the operation.

actors.name: MEENAKSHI (Staff)
actors.description: Sits nearby, smiles, implying a detached or knowing attitude.

actors.name: Patient (Token 39)
actors.description: An individual who stands up and goes to billing when their token is called.

location.name: Mercury Trauma Care Hospital/Billing Section
location.specific_details: The billing counter and adjacent waiting area of the Mercury Trauma Care Hospital.

scenes.technical_notes: Mechanical voice calling token numbers. Unni's reaction to the payment amount. Meenakshi's subtle smile.

actors.name: MANOJ ETTAN
actors.description: Mentioned as a 'thadiyan' (fat man) who rides a bullet, his son needs an actor for a play.

location.name: ATM
location.specific_details: An outdoor ATM with a queue.

crowd.crowd_type: People waiting in an ATM queue.

scenes.technical_notes: Robin winking. Focus on their conversation while waiting.

actors.name: CASHIER CHECHI
actors.description: Next to Meenakshi, likely assisting with billing.

actors.name: ROBIN
actors.description: Sits in the waiting area, observing.

actors.name: MANI
actors.description: A patient standing at the cashier's counter, providing slips.
